item.title: Customize article row count for Cerberus public knowledgebase community
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I've been evaluating the opensource Cerberus Helpdesk as an alternative to the closed source Kayako esupport.

item.title: Calling PHP from Ruby and reading STDOUT
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: PHP and Ruby syntax are far enough apart that I was loathe to attempt a port of some working PHP scripts in my arsenal, but I needed to call said scripts from a relatively complex Ruby program.
